glsa.title: GNU C Library: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in the GNU C Library, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: The GNU C library is the standard C library used by Gentoo Linux systems.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in the GNU C Library. Please review the CVE identifiers and Qualysâ€™ security advisory referenced below for details.

impact.p: An attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, escalate privileges or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GNU C Library users should upgrade to the latest version:

references.uri: Qualys Security Advisory - The Stack Clash
